page.title: 15Shops in our Area
page.content: In Goring there is one toy shop which is quite good.There are lots of sweet shops which sell icecream.There is one cafe,two garages,a laundrete,a shoe shop,a clothes shop,a hardware shop,some small supermarkets, a post office,several pubs,a camera shop,a chemist,a flower and garden shop,a video library,a butchers,two hairdressers and an estate agents. In Crays Pond there is a garage,a pub and a small farm. In our area of Woodcote there is a post office/general stores. None of the shops are very big but they sell enough little things like biscuits,eggs and small things like that.The main shopping is done in Wallingford and Reading.
